text: visvasigale, janarige torisuvudakkagi tanna sampattannu kharcu maduvavanante mattu allahanallagali, antima dinadallagali nambike illadavanante, nivu rnabhara horisuva hagu pidisuva mulaka nim'ma danagalannu vyarthagolisabedi. Anthavana udaharaneyu, mannu muccida, nunupada bandeyantide. Adara mele suriyuva birusada maleyu adannu subhragolisibiduttade. Tam'ma yava sampadaneya melu avarige niyantranavilla. Allahanu, dhikkarigalige saridariyannu torisuvudilla
